name: HexaRing
description:
This is an elegant puzzle game with unique mechanic and infinite gameplay.

It has stunning visual effects.

Each turn, you will be given a block consisting of a few regular hexagons. You must cover the rings on the board with these blocks. Once a ring is completely covered with hexagons it will destroy all the hexagons on it thus opens new area to fit new blocks.

If there is no room left for the next block, game is over.

It has unique ring blast mechanic and hexagonal board.

Destroy multiple rings at once and get rewards! Keep destroying rings each turn and continue your streak.
